text: wskhkhar lakum kl ma fi alsmwat min shams wqmr wnjwm, wakulu maa fi al'ard min dabat wshjr wsfn waghayr dhlk lmnafekm, jmye hadhih alnaeam mnt min allah wahdah 'aneam biha elykm, wafadl minh tafddal bh, f'iyah faebdu, wala tajealuu lah shrykana. 'inn fima skhrh allah lakum lelamat wdlalat ealaa whdanyt allah liqawm yatafakarun fi ayat allah whjjh wadlth, fyetbrwn bha
